thread.title: New Hawk KP-252 power bank launched at Rs 799
thread.title_full: New Hawk KP-252 power bank launched at Rs 799

author: Deccan
title: New Hawk KP-252 power bank launched at Rs 799
text:
Deccan Chronicle | September 07, 2015, 19.43 pm Hawk KP -252 features a 4000mAh and is available in 6 colours Kestrel Mobiles has launched its new portable power bank - Hawk KP-252. At 12 mm and 80 g, the Hawk KP -252 boasts of a 4000mAh li-polymer battery. Reliable and safe to use, these sleek looking, high quality power banks come with one USB output and a micro USB cable charger of same matching color as the power bank, a unique concept. Additionally, the Hawk KP -252 sports a LED indicator.
Available in 6 vibrant colour options â€“ White, Black, Blue, Orange, Green and Pink, the Hawk KP -252 is priced at Rs 799.
